column1: For information on confidentiality protection, sampling error, nonsampling error, and definitions, see www.census.gov/apsd/techdoc/cps/cpsmar10.pdf [http://www.census.gov/apsd/techdoc/cps/cpsmar10.pdf] [PDF].
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, Current Population Survey, 2010 Annual Social and Economic Supplement.
